description: Very small coordinate field, lack of any examples and instructions, nonworking simulation from time to time, unphisical "kraken" movement, lack of instruments, crashes from deleting many particles
This is a wonderful solver and simulator which is easy to use.

I love the concept but havent been able to see the proof of concept. I'm new to Linux and can't make sense of the file structure so it baffles me that the files are in the menu but when you tell the program to open one all of a sudden they dont exist.

Installed and runs on Ubuntu MATE with no apparent issues. Some nice and rather complex examples. However creating your own experiments is rather complicated and difficult to get operational - seems to be a connectivity of objects issue. Reasonably nice to play with.
Good for teacher to show SHM LF
summary: Very Good Software for Physics Simulation

description: Para empezar, el software me parece fantástico a nivel didáctico. Sin embargo estoy teniendo problemas con la ejecución de las simulaciones personales. Al cargar un ejemplo sale un error "Formato de URL erróneo"... Incluso los mismos ejemplos que trae el software no cargan adecuadamente... ¿qué ha ocurrido?
